entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , High River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:39 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then clearing. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
